pullrequest.title: pr2_mechanism is not a package, this breaks [tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=drcsim_control_sync&cat=drcsim)

content.raw:
The current pr2 dependencies in -release repository are:

```
jrivero@nium drcsim-release $ (prerelease *) grep -R pr2 * | uniq
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-mechanism,
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-controllers,
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-controller-manager,
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-controllers,
trusty/debian/control: ros-indigo-pr2-mechanism-msgs,
```

We are using pr2 mechanism msgs in `atlas_description/urdf/atlas.transmission` and pr2 controller manager in several files under `drcsim_gazebo/launch`
